channel.title: enum on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in enum on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: name
item.description: Returns the name of the enumerator member. This function does not generate a change. Function member.name() Arguments None Return value Returns the name of the enumerator member. Example This code creates a closure with a doc string: set_enum("Color", { RED: '#f00' }); // Return the name of Color{RED} Color{RED}.name(); Return value in JSON format "RED"

item.title: value
item.description: Returns the value of the enumerator member. This function does not generate a change. Function member.value() Arguments None Return value Returns the name of the enumerator member. Example This code creates a closure with a doc string: set_enum("Color", { RED: '#f00' }); val = Color{RED}.value(); assert( is_str( val ) ); // the value is of type `str` val.upper(); // Return the value upper case Return value in JSON format
